The museum can now display more specimens than ever before.Thus, I am considering adding fine works of art to this fine institution's repertoire. So, if you should find yourself in possession of a piece of art, by all means, please do show it to me.

Hootie hoo! I have exciting news for you, ! A piece of art has been donated to the museum! Indeed, that means an art exhibit is in order at last, wot wot!As such, we are in the midst of expanding these hallowed halls to house works of artistic import. I humbly encourage you to return once construction is complete.
I see. In that case, feel free to wander about as you like.I will await art donations with anticipation.

Hoo my! Why, , is that a piece of art you have in your possession?!
It is!
It's not for you.
Yes, yes, just as I suspected. Where DID you find it?!
Yes, well, I suspected as much. 'Tis not easy to come by a work of art such as this.

I do dearly wish to acquire a piece of fine art. Alas, I must forgo it at this time. Once the museum is open and our collection is underway, then we shall be able to display artworks properly. By my beak, I hope you will assist me with art acquisitions when that time comes.

I do dearly wish to acquire a piece of fine art. Alas, I must abstain at this time. I daresay we will be able to add art to our repertoire once the museum has grown its collection more fully. My feathers, I do hope you will assist me when that time comes.
Hoo, is that so?! What manner of art will you be showing me? I'm all aflutter!
Hoo! Hoo, I say! Splendid! What no-doubt priceless piece of art will you be showing me this time?
I do thank you for showing this to me, but, well I really must return it to you. Hoo, sad but true.
Now, if you were to donate this Your generosity would enable us to add an art exhibit to our beloved museum. What say you? Might I give this work of art a new home?
I'm donating it!
I'll keep it.
Of course, if you were to donate this The museum could expand to include an art gallery! Hoo, what say you? Would you place it in my good care?
I suppose.
Nope.
Ah. I see. A sublime piece of art such as this would, indeed, be difficult to part with. And so I shall simply thank you for showing it to me. Now, back to you it goes.
Should you acquire any more works of art, I would, of course, be most grateful if you showed them to me.
Jolly good and hoot hoot hooray! Splendid news indeed! I really can't thank you enough!
It pleases me greatly to say that I will now be able to apply for an expansion to the museum! Hoo! So much to do! I must prepare for construction immediately!Ah, , a thousand thanks indeed!
I am pleased to say the art exhibit is finally finished!
Thanks to you, the art gallery is now complete!
Your very own donations made it all possible, . So, to you I am most grateful.
The entrance to the gallery is but a jaunt up the stairs. Please, do take a gander at your leisure.

Ah! There is one more thing I should mentionAll the collections are now complete! That goes for the art collection too.A wondrous achievement indeed, but it does mean we will no longer be accepting new donations.That said, I will continue to pass along fascinating facts about the specimens brought to me. Simply say, "Tell me about this!" and I shall regale you with wondrous details you won't soon forget. My feathers, I do go on! Please, go browse our magnificent collection.

Ah! There is one more thing I should mentionWe are not accepting new donations for the other exhibits. We can only take donations to the art gallery. And in that regard, I sincerely hope you will be generous with your assistance.

Eh wot?! This is the first time I've seen you since the museum opened?I say! A brief tour is in order!You will find display rooms featuring donated specimens to the left, right, on the second floor, and downstairs. A jaunt upstairs will take you to the art exhibit, which was just added during our recent expansion.
